boat-neck-sweater.name: Boat Neck Sweater
boat-neck-sweater.hero: Knit a timeless boat neck sweater — perfectly sized for you.
boat-neck-sweater.description: Create your own boat neck sweater — sleeveless or with sleeves of any length. Enter your gauge, adjust sizing, and knit it in any yarn or stitch pattern.

diy-blanket.name: DIY Blanket
diy-blanket.hero: Design the perfect blanket — any yarn, any size, any machine
diy-blanket.description: Design your own blanket for any yarn, any machine, any gauge. Choose a standard size or set your own — includes a built-in yarn estimator.

gauge-calculator.name: Gauge Calculator
gauge-calculator.hero: Get your gauge right — no math, no mistakes.
gauge-calculator.description: Accurate gauge means accurate fit. Measure your swatch, enter the numbers, and instantly get your stitch and row gauge in inches or centimeters.

gauge-conversion-calculator.name: Gauge Conversion Calculator
gauge-conversion-calculator.hero: Adjust any pattern to your yarn or tension — no math, no guesswork.
gauge-conversion-calculator.description: Convert any pattern to match your gauge. Enter the pattern's gauge and your own, and this tool instantly recalculates your stitch and row counts—no math required.

neckline-shaping-practice-2.name: Neckline Shaping Practice
neckline-shaping-practice-2.hero: Unsure about necklines? Try it here first.
neckline-shaping-practice-2.description: Build your neckline-shaping skills. This tool creates stitch and row numbers for a small practice piece so you can refine your technique before starting a full sweater.

neckline-and-shoulder-shaping.name: Neckline and Shoulder Shaping
neckline-and-shoulder-shaping.hero: Master the trickiest shaping combo: neckline and shoulder.
neckline-and-shoulder-shaping.description: A hands-on way to practice shaping the neckline and shoulder together for a better-fitting sweater. Enter your gauge to create a simple, skill-building sample.

gauge-difference.name: What a Difference a Stitch Makes
gauge-difference.hero: A tiny change in gauge can make a big difference. See how your project grows (or shrinks) — one stitch at a time.
gauge-difference.description: Compare two gauges and see how even one stitch can change your project's size.

magic-formula-measurement.name: Magic Formula by Measurement
magic-formula-measurement.hero: Shape your knitting using real measurements instead of stitch counts.
magic-formula-measurement.description: Enter your starting and ending widths, your row length, and gauge to instantly see your shaping instructions. Perfect for knitters who think in inches and centimeters.
